website_summaries.verdict: The Nokia Astound is a beautifully designed and affordable smartphone for T-Mobile, but there are other budget-friendly options available with better performance and that are easier to use.
pros: The Nokia Astound boasts a sleek, premium design and affordable price tag
Call quality is good, and the phone's 8-megapixel camera takes great photos and video
cons: The smartphone can be sluggish and the Symbian 3 operating system is still behind the curve in ease of use and functionality

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty turquoise Mason Cash mixing bowl!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several Mason Cash mixing bowls from this seller and I can't be more pleased with the swift shipment and the quality of these Mason Cash bowls. This bowl was well packaged to ensure it arrived safely, just like the others that I have purchased from this seller. This particular bowl will be just right for a nice big batch of cookies without worry of spilling over or getting flour all over the counter. I'm so happy to have this pretty and functional bowl! Thank you, Gourmet Kitchen! I gladly give you five out of five stars, and will be on the lookout for other products that you have to sell! Great job!
customer_reviews.author: The Bee

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is absolutely gorgeous! The only thing is that it's very delicate and if it chips, it cracks. It's sturdy enough to use as a mixing bowl, and beautiful as a serving piece.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Form and function
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful enough for a gift, sturdy enough for frequent use. I bought this to use primarily for baking (mixing batter, proofing dough) but the gorgeous color and glaze make it great for serving as well . It is surprisingly lightweight, though feels sturdy when you handle it, as some ceramic bowls do. I love this bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this bowl for making sourdough bread, it is a good size and very nice. I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Day

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These bills are amazing. It's my go to bowl for everything. Lighter in weight than they look. Absolutely beautiful bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this bowl
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this bowl! It's light and classic looking. The mixing area is wide and shallow to make mixing pie doughs and other sorts so easy! Will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Antoinette Madrid

customer_reviews.title: I love mason cash and this color is great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I love mason cash and this color is great!
customer_reviews.author: BeckJ

customer_reviews.title: Love the bowls
customer_reviews.text: Love the bowls, just what I was looking for! Colors are bright and great for spring. Came wrapped very good. Can't wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie V.

customer_reviews.title: My Gift To Myself
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this beautiful bowl for its color and graceful shape. I already own an older Mason Cash bowl that I bought in a curio shop, so I was surprised to discover that this new bowl is much lighter than its elder counterpart. What a delightful surprise! I don't have to use a winch to pick it up, so I will be using my new treasure a lot more than I did my other one.
customer_reviews.author: 50251sid

customer_reviews.title: Nice Price
customer_reviews.text: Nice price but would guess it' a second. They is defect under the glaze. Nice Color and very usable.
customer_reviews.author: Sage House on the Turnpike

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Love the bowl. A bit disappointed in how thin it is. Could be a thicker ceramic
customer_reviews.author: debbi kohler

product_meta.title: Mason Cash Color Mix S12 11.4" Turquoise Mixing Bowl
feature_bullets: Chip resistant fine stoneware mixing bowl from Mason Cash, the bakeware experts
Traditional, distinctive patterned exterior helps grip the bowl when mixing
Bowl counters the tendency to move during manual mixing
Bright, vibrant colour palette - stir some colour into your kitchen
Dishwasher and microwave safe, bowl diameter: 29 cm, height: 14 cm
